submodules.title: On-chain Treasury System
submodules.description: A decentralized treasury that allows members to pool funds securely on the blockchain, ensuring transparency and traceability of all transactions.

submodules.title: Staking Mechanism
submodules.description: Enables proposal submitters to stake a specified amount of cryptocurrency, ensuring that only serious proposals are submitted and providing a financial incentive for responsible behavior.

submodules.title: Proposal-Based Funding
submodules.description: A structured process where community members can submit funding proposals, which are then voted on by the community, ensuring democratic decision-making.

submodules.title: Slashing Mechanism
submodules.description: A safety feature that penalizes misuse of funds by returning the staked amount to the treasury if a proposal is reported and found to be misused, thus protecting community assets.

submodules.title: Community Voting System
submodules.description: A secure and transparent voting mechanism that allows members to vote on funding proposals, ensuring that every voice is heard in the decision-making process.

submodules.title: Role-Based Permissions
submodules.description: Utilizes verified identities to assign roles and permissions within the platform, ensuring that only authorized members can submit proposals or vote, enhancing security and accountability.

submodules.title: On-Chain Identity Verification
submodules.description: Integrates with Self Protocol to verify user identities on-chain, ensuring that all participants are legitimate and reducing the risk of fraud within the community.

submodules.title: GitHub Integration
submodules.description: Facilitates collaboration by linking project repositories, allowing community members to track development progress and contribute to proposals directly from GitHub.

submodules.title: Discord Integration
submodules.description: Enhances community engagement by integrating with Discord, providing real-time communication and updates on proposals, votes, and treasury activities.

submodules.title: Real-Time Dashboard
submodules.description: A user-friendly interface that visualizes proposals, fund flow, and voting statistics, allowing members to easily track the status of community initiatives and treasury health.

submodules.title: Modular Structure
submodules.description: Designed to accommodate various types of organizations, including DAOs, NGOs, and grant committees, providing flexibility in how funds are managed and proposals are structured.
